content: 1. fast 단식하다, 절식하다; 금식하다. - Wade: Aren’t you supposed to fast when you have a colonoscopy?
title: The Unicorn S02E12 영어 표현

content: 2. account 이유. - Michelle: Look, I know you’re trying to be nice to Meg on my account, but you don’t have to be.
title: The Unicorn S02E12 영어 표현

content: 3. break off sth to end a relationship. - Wade: I mean, I know we did the right thing be breaking it off.
title: The Unicorn S02E12 영어 표현

content: 4. clean as a whistle extremely clean. - Ben: All good. - Michelle: Really? - Ben: Clean as a whistle.
title: The Unicorn S02E12 영어 표현

content: “좋아하는 사람이 좋아하는 사람을 좋아하고 싶었을 뿐이야”
title: 210219 다만, 널 사랑하고 있어 [2006]

content: p. 26 그러나 우리는 우리가 사랑하게 된 사람이 누구인지 잘 모르는 상태에서 사랑에 빠질 수밖에 없는 것 같다.
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: p. 27 그(녀)가 나를 바라는 것일까, 바라지 않는 것일까?
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: p. 33 모든 것에서 의미를 읽어내는 낭만적 편집증 환자가 되었다. 가장 매력적인 사람은 곧바로 우리에게 입맞춤을 허락하는 사람이나 절대 우리에게 입맞춤을 허용하지 않는 사람이 아니라, 희망과 절망의 양을 적절하게 안배하여 상대의 마음에 안겨줄 줄 아는 사람이다.
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: p. 39 가장 매력을 느끼지 못하는 사람을 가장 쉽게 유혹할 수 있다는 것은 사랑의 아이러니 가운데 하나이다.
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: p. 41 클로이는 너무나 오랫동안 나의 유일한 생각이었지만, 지금 이 순간에는 내가 그녀와 공유할 수 없는 하나의 생각이었다. 유혹에 서툰 사람이 오히려 진정한 마음을 가진 사람이라고 관대하게 봐줄 수도 있다.
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: p. 56 나는 키스한다, 고로 나는 생각하지 않는다.
title: 왜 나는 너를 사랑하는가 글귀

content: 1. have/know sth down pat to know something so well that you can say or do it without having to try or think. - Jay: I wasn’t the greatest husband the first time around, but, I’m tyring to do better this time. And maybe by my third marriage, I’ll have it down pat.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 2. mean to ~ 할 셈이다. - Phil: What ya reading there? A book? - Claire: Yeah. I’ve been meaning to get to it for a while.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 3. keep up to be able to understand or deal with something that is happening or changing very fast. to stay level or equal with someone or something. - Claire: The thing is, I like to run alone. And I run kinda fast, so- - Phil: So? - Claire: So I’m not sure you’re gonna be able to keep up with me. - Phil: You’re kid- You’re kidding, right? - Claire: No. - Phil: You really think I can’t keep up with you? - Claire: I’m not sure you can keep up with this conversation.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 4. on call used to describe workers who are available to make official visits at any time when they are needed. - Miura: Hi, I’m Dr. Miura. I’m on call today.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 5. draft off (자동차, 자전거 경주에서) 앞차 바로 뒤를 달림. - Phil: Saving my energy, drafting off of you.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 6. no can do 안 되겠어[할 수 없어]. - Claire: Pull over right there. - Haley: I don’t like cops. I can’t pull over. - Claire: You need to pull over! - Phil: No can do. No can do. - Claire: Phil! - Phil: I got priors. The parking ticket from the mall. I never paid the parking ticket. Keep moving, sweetheart.
title: Modern Family S01E06 영어 표현

content: 1. give off 풍기다. - Jared: Uh, this is a liability release form. I need you and your husband to sign it. - Shannon: What? Him? - Wade: Yo-You thought that we were together? - Shannon: That’s so funny. No, no, no, no, no. - Wade: No, we’re not together. I mean, we came here together, but we’re not married or anything. - Shannon: Do we give off that vibe?
title: The Unicorn S02E08 영어 표현

content: 1. table to delay discussion of a subject. - Gina: I can see your lips moving, but I can not hear you talking. - Drew: Uh… Why don’t we table this for later?
title: B Positive S01E07 영어 표현

content: 2. get under sb’s skin to annoy someone. - Gina: She said my crazy kidney guy left her a snarky-ass message about how great I am that really got under her skin.
title: B Positive S01E07 영어 표현

content: 3. be/get carried away to become so excited about something that you do not control what you say or do. - Drew: I was trying to bring you closer together, but I think I got a little carried away.
title: B Positive S01E07 영어 표현

content: - Kate: If you need this, Jack, if you really need this, I will take these kids from a life they love, and I’ll take myself from the only home we’ve ever shared together, and I’ll move wherever you need to go. I’ll do that because I love you. I love you, and that’s more important to me than our address. I choose us. - Kate: I’m sure that right now, there’s nowhere else I’d rather be than here with you. - Jack: you’re a better person than I am, and it made me a better person to be around you.
title: 210212 The Family Man [2000]

content: 1. flat out 딱 부러지게, 완전히. - Cynthia: And I love his family and his dogs, but I told him flat out, I won’t do that with Butch in the room.
title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현

content: 2. ill at ease feeling anxious and not relaxed. - Wade: Yeah, uh, Forrest got a deal online, but they make him nervous. - Forrest: Nah, more ill at ease, let’s say.
title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현

content: 3. get off on the right/wrong foot to make a successful/unsuccessful start in something. - Delia: She hates me. - Wade: She doesn’t hate you. - Delia: We just got off on the wrong foot, at the restaurant, when I told them to just chill out on the, on the miso glaze, and then here at dinner when she stabbed you.
title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현

content: 4. run something by someone to tell something to someone. - Wade: Hey, uh, can I, uh… can I run something by you? - Delia: Yeah.
title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현

content: 5. lay it on thick to praise someone too much. - Ben: Oh, so that was your little friend Kevin, huh? - Michelle: Uh-huh. - Ben: Uh-huh. Wow. Man, he was laying it on thick.
title: The Unicorn S02E06 영어 표현

content: p. 76 ‘더 강해져야 해. 지금보다 훨씬 훨씬 더! 상대가 그 누구라도 내가 지키고 싶은 사람을 지킬 수 있도록!’
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 108 ‘네가 봐줄 때의 내 힘이 진짜 하얀 늑대의 이빨이니까!’
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 136 사랑을 하려면 기적이 일어나야 한다. 하지만 아무것도 안 하고 있으면 일어날 기적도 일어나지 않는다!
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 138 “충고 한마디 해드리죠, 마법사님. 세상 어떤 남자도 여자에게 사랑에 대한 조언은 하지 못해요.”
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 169 “위대한 전쟁과 하찮은 사랑 놀음이라고? 너와 내 기준이 다를 뿐이다. 내게 있어서는 하찮은 전쟁이고 위대한 사랑이다.”
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 180 “우리, 이제야 만났군요.”
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 316 정했으면 움직여. 그다음은, 그다음에 결정하는 거야.
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 374 “우린 그저 열심히 살아가는 겁니다. 누구나 그렇겠죠. 무슨 일이 어떤 식으로 될지, 운명이 어떤 식으로 이끌지는 모두 끝나 봐야 아는 겁니다. 어떤 일이 벌어진 다음에 운명대로 그렇게 되었다고 말하기는 쉽지요.”
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 378 내일 다른 곳에 있을 너는 오늘 여기 있는 너와 다를 거고, 내일의 너는 어제의 너에게 고맙다고 말하게 될 거라고.
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: p. 395 “왜 당신을 더 사랑하지 못했을까? 왜 당신 얼굴을 더 바라보지 못했을까? 이렇게 10초가 아쉬운 순간이 올 줄 알았다면 더 사랑하고, 더 봤을 텐데.”
title: 하얀 늑대들 XI 글귀

content: 1. grow a pair [Verb] (vulgar,idiomatic) To be brave; to show some courage, especially in a situation in which one has so far failed to do so. - Gideon: You’re a shrink. Can’t you get a copy of the eval and coach her through it? - Drew: Oh, no, no. I couldn’t. That would be cheating. - Samantha: Grow a pair, Bambi.
title: B Positive S01E06 영어 표현

content: 2. take the high road to behave in a moral way when other people are not behaving morally. - Drew: Oh– Uh, I think I accidentally liked it. - Gina: Drew! - Drew: Maybe it’ll look like you’re taking the high road.
title: B Positive S01E06 영어 표현

content: 3. come off to happen as planned, or to succeed. - Gina: By the way, you’re getting my kidney. - Drew: What? - Gina: I passed the psych test. She doesn’t think I’m crazy, but you didn’t come off so good.
title: B Positive S01E06 영어 표현

content: 1. put one’s foot down 단호한 태도를 취하다. - Phil: Sometimes a man’s gotta put his foot down and do what a man’s gotta do.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 2. rub sb the wrong way to annoy someone without intending to. - Mitchell: Her future best friend might be in that class, and I don’t wanna rub anyone the wrong way.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 3. start sb off 1. ~에게(~을 하기) 시작하게 하다. 2. ~가 (~을) 시작하도록 하다[돕다/이끌다]. - Danielle: Okay, we’re gonna start with the Hello Dance, and then we’re gonna move on to blocks, then finger painting, and then we’re gonna do our Family Dance. All right. Who wants to start us off?
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 4. get a break 행운을 얻다, ~을 면제받다, ~에 특혜를 받다. - Phil: So, any chance I could, uh, get a break on this one?
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 5. throw in ~을 덤으로[거저] 주다[포함시키다]. - Bike Salesman: I can throw in a bell- - Phil: Deal.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 6. queen a gay man. - Cameron: Loot at those queens.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 7. hold that thought [Verb] (idiomatic,often,imperative) To pause in a conversation for an interruption. - Jay: Hello. Hey, Javier. Manny’s waiting for you outside. What? Why not? Hold that thought.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 8. when all is said and done said when you are about to tell someone the most important fact they should remember in a situation. - Jay: Okay. The key to being a good dad? Look, sometimes things work out just the way you want. Sometimes they don’t. You gotta hang in there. Because when all is said and done, 90% of being a dad is just showin' up.
title: Modern Family S01E02 영어 표현

content: 1. tell someone off to tell someone that they have done something wrong and that you are angry about it. 야단 치다. - Soccer Mom: Come on, Coach. You gotta take that kid out. - Gloria: You wanna take him out? How about I take you out? - Jay: Honey, honey. - Gloria: Why don’t you worry about your son? He spent the first half with his hand in his pants! - Josh: I’ve wanted to tell her off for the last six weeks.
title: Modern Family S01E01 영어 표현

content: 2. out sick 아파서 결석[결근]하다. - Alex: This senior at school was “out sick” for four months, but Jenna Resnick swears she saw her breast-feeding at a coin-op car wash.
title: Modern Family S01E01 영어 표현

content: 1. get off to …으로 시작하다. - Cameron: We got off to an awkward start with our pediatrician, a very nice Asian lady named Dr. Miura.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 2. queen a gay man. - Cameron: Why do you think the dentist gives me all that free stuff? - Mitchell: Um, because he’s a huge queen and he has a big crush on you.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 3. by all means ? - Manny: I have a fever. - Gloria: Ay, mi amor. Come here and I feel you. - Manny: Ooh. I don’t wanna get you sick. It could be fatal. - Jay: Then by all means, stand next to me.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 4. line 혈통. - Gloria: How about we take him to the pier and go fishing, huh? Manny! - Jay: He likes to fish? - Gloria: Yeah. He comes from a long line of fishermen and smugglers.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 5. stay in the present 집중하다. ? - Luke: How are you supposed to steer if you don’t know where you’re going? - Phil: Stay in the present, buddy. Gotta do it by feel. - Luke: Did you just lose my truck? - Phil: No. - Luke: You just lost my truck! - Phil: No, I didn’t! - Luke: That was my truck! Grandpa just gave it to me! - Phil: I told you to stay in the present!
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 6. clear as day 명백한, 분명한, 뚜렷한. - Miura: Look, I don’t even think she said the “M” word. - Cameron: No, we heard it. It was clear as day.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 7. let up (강도가) 약해지다[누그러지다]. - Manny: What if I throw up? - Gloria: I will clean it up. It wouldn’t be the first time. - Manny: You’re not gonna let up, are you? - Gloria: Baby, I think you know the answer. - Manny: Fine. Let’s get it over with.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 8. get something over (with) (불쾌하지만 해야 할 일을) 해 내다[완료하다]. - Manny: What if I throw up? - Gloria: I will clean it up. It wouldn’t be the first time. - Manny: You’re not gonna let up, are you? - Gloria: Baby, I think you know the answer. - Manny: Fine. Let’s get it over with.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 9. hand-me-down 물림 옷. - Claire: Then you do the exact same thing I told your sister, okay? - Alex: Even the advice I get is a hand-me-down.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 10. cracked up to be 구어 …이라는 평판이다, …이라고 믿어져 있다. - Miura: What I’m trying to say is having a mother isn’t always what it’s cracked up to be.
title: Modern Family S01E16 영어 표현

content: 1. shoot over 빨리 가다. - Cameron: We’re gonna shoot over to Great Shakes, get a table.
title: Modern Family S01E15 영어 표현

content: 2. pull off (힘든 것을) 해내다[성사시키다]. - Cameron: Now, if we can pull this off, you and your little lady friend will be belly up to a ice cream counter having a milk shake with two straws.
title: Modern Family S01E15 영어 표현

content: 3. belly up to …에 바짝 접근하다[다가가다], 성큼성큼 다가가다; (술집으로) 직행하다. - Cameron: Now, if we can pull this off, you and your little lady friend will be belly up to a ice cream counter having a milk shake with two straws.
title: Modern Family S01E15 영어 표현

content: 4. by heart 외워서[기억하여]. - Cameron: Would you please rank your favorite ice creams at Great Shakes from least favorite to favorite? - Durkas: I don’t know ‘em by heart.
title: Modern Family S01E15 영어 표현

content: 1. cold feet [구어] 겁, 공포; 달아나려는 자세. - Barbara: Phil, it’s Barbara. The Pattersons wanna back out of the deal. - Phil: Why? What happened? - Barbara: The wife’s getting cold feet.
title: Modern Family S01E14 영어 표현

content: 2. get one’s ducks in a row To ensure all of the small details or elements are accounted for and in their proper positions before embarking on a new project. - Mitchell: Okay. Maybe, uh, we shoud go over the accident one more time. - Gloria: Put the dogs on a row. You’re such a good lawyer. Gloria가 잘못 말함.
title: Modern Family S01E14 영어 표현

content: 3. rule [美속어] 발군이다, 최고이다. - Phil: Okay, You are so crazy. That song totally rules.
title: Modern Family S01E14 영어 표현

content: 1. come out of the closet Admitting to being gay. - Mitchell: I came out of the closet in my mid-20s.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 2. as they come Very. - Jay: These guys don’t understand the gay thing. Why create an awkward situation? That’s all I’m saying. - Mitchell: That’s weird, because your friend Shorty there- gay as they come.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 3. put out To be willing to engage in casual sexual activity; be sexually available. - Whitney: Maybe for you. I mean, men must throw themselves at you every day. - Gloria: They’ll do the same for you if you just- - Whitney: Just what? Put out?
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 4. get[go] medieval Become crazy. - Cameron: The flowers. They look so much better! This is a disaster. - Mitchell: You do know what “disaster” means, right? - Cameron: You don’t understand. I demanded that they come exchange them. I got all medieval on the florist.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 5. get away with …을 잘 해내다. - Shorty: Look at his pants- no pleats. I like pants like that. You think I can get away with something like that? - Jay: Sure. Why not?
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 6. dough 돈. - Shorty: I’m in debt. - Jay: Huh? - Shorty: I owe a bookie 20 G’s and he’s a serious guy. And you offering to give me the dough- This is beautiful.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 7. give or take 대략, 약. - Mitchell: Can people change? I don’t know. People are who they are- give or take, yeah, 15%.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 8. jam 곤란, 궁지. - Shorty: Listen, I wanna thank you for, you know, helping me out with that jam.
title: Modern Family S01E13 영어 표현

content: 1. old ball and chain one’s wife. - Jay: So, trouble in gay paradise, huh? - Mitchell: He just can’t say no to anybody who needs help. And why do you have to always add the word “gay” where it doesn’t belong? - Jay: Hey, hey, you’re not mad at me. You’re mad at the old balls and chain.
title: Modern Family S01E12 영어 표현

content: 1. out of the blue 갑자기, 난데없이. - Jay: The hell is he doing here? - Gloria: Jay. - Jay: No. He was supposed to pick up Manny yesterday and disappointed him again, as usual. Now he just sails in here out of the blue?
title: Modern Family S01E11 영어 표현

content: 2. by all means 물론, 분명히. - Phil: By all means, Claire, we want you looking your sexiest when the hunky, gay firemen get here!
title: Modern Family S01E11 영어 표현

content: 3. pool 포켓볼(여러 색깔의 공 16개로 하는 당구 비슷한 게임. 흔히 pub이나 bar에서 함). - Gloria: What’s the matter? - Jay: He’s playing on my pool table, that’s what.
title: Modern Family S01E11 영어 표현

content: 4. grab[have, take, get, catch, hold] something by the throat (사태 따위를) 장악하다, 좌지우지하다, 남의 급소를 쥐다. - Javier: From me, he learns how to be spontaneous, grab life by the throat.
title: Modern Family S01E11 영어 표현

content: 1. stage (면밀한 계획이 필요한 일을, 특히 대중 시위로) 벌이다. - Cameron: Uh, last year, one of my carolers-Andrew- staged a little coup.
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 2. canned 해고당한. - Cameron: Thanks, Santa. - Santa: Can’t call me that anymore. Just got canned.
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 3. sharp (하루 중의 특정 시간을 나타내는 표현 뒤에 쓰여) 정각. - Jay: Okay. Tonight, 9:00 sharp, we open one present each.
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 4. swing [속어] 부부 교환[그룹 섹스]을 하다; 프리섹스를 하다. - Santa: So, who’s ready to try the swing?
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 5. back down (주장 등을) 굽히다, 패배를 인정하다. - Phil: Would it really be so bad to back down? - Claire: And have the kids never take any of our threats seriously again?
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 6. rub one’s nose in something 남에게 달갑지 않은 체험을 시키다, …에게 그 사람이 잘못한 일을 생각나게 하다, 이미 일어난 잘못된 일이나 불운한 일을 …에게 상기시키다(동물을 집에서 길들이는 방법에서). - Mitchell: They’re Cameron’s old caroling group. They kicked him out this year. - Cameron: I mean, it is one thing to kick me out of the group, but to rub my nose in it!
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 7. shoot one’s mouth off 경솔하게 말하다, 무심코 말해 버리다. - Haley: Wait a- You were going to take Christmas away for something that none of us did? - Phil: Well, um, Christmas is about moving forward. - Alex: I’ve never heard that. - Claire: Actually, honey, you did kinda shoot your mouth off.
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 8. get worked up 흥분하다, …에 대해 소동을 부리다. - Luke: You called us all liars. - Alex: Yeah, you did, and then- - Phil: Let’s not all get worked up.
title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현

content: 1. bag to hunt and kill an animal or bird. - Gloria: We can’t give Luke a crossbow. He pokes himself in the eye every time he uses a straw. - Jay: Are you kidding? I had one when I was his age. My dad used to give me a quarter for every crow I bagged.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 2. throw 비격식 [VN] 충격을 주다, 당혹스럽게[놀라게] 하다. - Manny: I need your advice, Jay. - Jay: Really? - Manny: She’s gonna be at Luke’s party. - Jay: Well, I’m a little thrown. I mean, you don’t usually come to me for advice.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 3. cocoa shit. - Phil: Is there anything that scares the cocoa out of you?
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 4. release 기권(증서), 양도(증서), 포기(증서). - Claire: Sweetie, that’s a rock wall. Is that even safe? Oh, my god. - Phil: Honey, relax. Hey, has anyone ever gotten hurt on one of these things? - Rock Climb Operator: I don’t know, man. It’s my first day. - Phil: See? They wouldn’t let the new guy do it if it- - Claire: That did not make me feel better. - Phil: Don’t worry. I signed, like, a hundred releases.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 5. carrottop 빨강머리. - Mitchell: Ass. - Guy at Gas Station: What did you say? - Mitchell: Just forget about it, all right? - Guy at Gas Station: Listen, carrottop. I didn’t touch you.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 6. gloat (자신의 성공에) 흡족해 하다, (남의 실패를) 고소해 하다. - Phil: Oh. It’s so peaceful and quiet over here. - Claire: Ha-ha. If you came over here to gloat, I already know it’s a dud.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 7. dud something that has no value or that does not work. - Phil: Oh. It’s so peaceful and quiet over here. - Claire: Ha-ha. If you came over here to gloat, I already know it’s a dud.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 8. scat [보통 명령문으로] 저리 가라. - Jay: Guys, hit the road. Come on. You’re family men. Come on. Scat.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 9. tanked To do badly or at it, or fail. - Mitchell: Uh, you know, I gotta say, for all his craziness, I love my clown. - Claire: Me too. They’re good for us. I would’ve totally tanked this party.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 10. cast 깁스. - Phil: Sorry about today, buddy. We’ll try again next year, huh? - Luke: Are you kidding? This was the best birthday ever. - Claire: What? - Luke: I got a cast.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 11. smother 숨막히게 하다, 질식시키다. - Manny: Bianca Douglas called me three times tonight. I’m not gonna lie to you. I’m starting to feel smothered.
title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현

content: 1. bureau 서랍장. - Claire: Okay, your turn. - Phill: My turn? Where is it? - Claire: It’s on the bureau.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 2. raise the roof to play/sing very loudly and enthusiastically. - Cameron: Ooh, raise the roof, Lily.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 3. kick off (~을) 시작하다. - Claire: Wait a minute. You- You thought the coupons were your only present? Are you kidding me? - Phil: They aren’t? - Claire: No! Oh, Phil, come on. It’s our anniversary. Those coupons were just, like, a fun little way to kick off the day.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 4. read ‘em and weep 1. (informal) Used to express confidence when showing a winning poker hand. 2. (informal, by extension) Used as a taunt when outperforming or one-upping rivals. - Claire: Bam! Read it and weep, Phil. - Phil: Oh.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 5. squat Nothing or not meaning anything. - Jay: I got nothing. - Gloria: I think I have a very good pair. - Jay: You sure do, honey. - Alex: And I got squat.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 6. get round/around 1. (문제를 성공적으로) 해결[처리]하다. 2. ~을 할 시간[짬]을 내다. - Jay: Lightbulb went out. You don’t change these right away, you never get around to it.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 7. get off 떠나다[출발하다]. - Jay: But nobody gets off The Rock.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 8. snog 英, 비격식 (특히 오랫동안) 진한 키스를 하다. - Izzy: Hey, Phil, I think your lover wants a kiss from you. - Phil: Oh. Okay. - Izzy: Oh, come on, man. She’s not your sister. Give her a proper snog.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 9. complication 합병증. - Izzy: My sister lost her feet to complications from diabetes.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 10. noodle 구식, 美, 속어 = noddle 머리. - Phil: [Humming] - Izzy: I just did that one, didn’t I? Yeah. - Phil: That’s why it’s in the noodle.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 11. segue to move easily and without interruption from one piece of music, part of a story, subject, or situation to another. - Cameron: I mean, what do we do? Do we say something? How do we even bring it up? - Mitchell: She threatened our child, and that’s your concern- a segue?
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 12. act out 말썽을 피우다. 버릇없이 굴다. 나대다. 반항하다. - Cameron: It’s where the first child is happy, and then the second child comes along, and the first child gets jealous of the second child and starts acting out.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 13. Yoko Second wife of John Lennon. Often blamed for the break-up of the Beatles when infact she just happened to be there. This is called Yoko syndrome. - Sal: Okay, that was a joke, you guys. Come on. Fine. Show me the picture of Yoko. - Mitchell: See, it’s- - Cameron: Sal. - Sal: Okay. It’s a joke. You guys! Come on. ‘Cause she’s Asian, and she broke up our group.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 14. a pill A person who is can just get on every nerve, they are bitter and basically hard to swallow like a pill. - Haley: Why are you being like this? I just wanted to go to that party for, like, two hours. I would’ve been back by now. Would that have killed you? - Jay: She’s just like her mother. - Gloria: Why are you treating Haley like this? - Jay: Me? She’s the one acting like a pill.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 15. put sth over on sb to persuade someone to believe something that is not true. - Jay: You try to put something over on me, you’re gonna lose.
title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현

content: 1. drop the ball (책임지고 있는 일을) 실수로 망치다. - Phil: And then, uh, I guess that leaves Luke. We dropped the ball a little on that one. - Claire: Yeah, a little bit.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 2. panties on a bunch When someone acts in an anal-retentive manner, and makes a big fuss out of a relatively minor problem. - Mitchell: That took a while. - Cameron: She’s been asleep for 20 minutes. It just took me some time to sneak out without waking her up. - Mitchell: Kind of like the first time you slept over here. - Cameron: I had a meeting. All right. Let’s talk about why you got your panties in a bunch.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 3. meet (운동)경기[대회]. - Cameron: Mitchell is still upset because Claire quit the team right before some meet.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 4. stir up 1. (강한 감정을) 불러일으키다. 2. (논쟁·문제 등을) 일으키다[유발/유도하다]. 3. (바람결·물결 속에서 어떤 움직임이) 일게 하다. - Cameron: So, seeing your dad so proud of Manny didn’t stir up any resentment?
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 5. rule out 제외시키다, 배제하다; 불가능하게 하다. - Phil: You’ve already got, what, how many hours playing ball? - Luke: Well, I played, like one season, so, like, 6,000 hours? - Claire: Yeah. I can see why you ruled out math.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 6. cup (운동 경기 때 남자가 성기 보호용으로 사타구니에 차는) 보호대. - Phil: Oh, should’ve worn my cup.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 7. butterflies [pl.] (긴장·흥분·걱정 등으로 인한) 불안한 마음, 가슴 설렘, 초조감. - Manny: It’s just not fun anymore. - Jay: Well, that’s propably just butterflies.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 8. clear the air to remove the bad feelings between people - Cameron: So, there’s no part of you that wants to clear the air with your sister?
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 9. work (sth) out If a problem or difficult situation works out, it gradually becomes better or satisfactory, and if you work it out, you make it better or satisfactory. - Cameron: Oaky, you know what? I can’t bear this. Claire, Mitchell still resents you for quitting the figure skating team when you were kids. Ladies, come inside with me, please. Work it out.
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 10. a pill A person who is can just get on every nerve, they are bitter and basically hard to swallow like a pill. - Mitchell: I’m-I’m sorry. I’m sorry for being such a pill, okay?
title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현

content: 1. sweep sth under the rug to hide a problem or try to keep it secret instead of dealing with it. - Gloria: She’s always had a problem with me. I think I’m gonna find out what it is. - Jay: That’s the worst thing you could do. Just sweep it under the rug.
title: Modern Family S01E05 영어 표현

content: 2. in light of sth …에 비추어, …을 고려하여. - Phil: Now in light of what happened at school today, do you have any feelings you’d like to express?
title: Modern Family S01E05 영어 표현

content: 3. already used to show that you are losing patience and want someone to stop doing something or to do something more quickly. [화남·초조함을 나타내어] 빨리, 지금 즉시. - Clare: Haley, get off the phone already.
title: Modern Family S01E05 영어 표현

content: 4. be torn (between A and B) (A와 B 사이에서) 갈피를 잡지 못하다[어쩔 줄을 모르다]. - Jay: You’re not leaving, are you? - Mitchell: You know, there’s kind of a lot of drama. - Cameron: So we're torn.
title: Modern Family S01E05 영어 표현

content: 1. pull a fast one To deceive someone. - Jay: Listen, I would love to get this thing behind us, but Gloria would never forgive me if I pulled a fast one on her. That’s why you’re goning to pull a fast one on her, and I’m not going to like it one bit.
title: Modern Family S01E04 영어 표현

content: 2. spring 갑자기 알리다[발언하다](announce, reveal). - Jay: So you just spring it on Gloria like this?
title: Modern Family S01E04 영어 표현

content: 1. 환경 Linux hugo git GitHub
title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기

content: 2. 개요 Hugo로 블로그를 만들고 GitHub Pages에 hosting 해보겠습니다. 블로그의 주소는 https://<깃헙 아이디>.github.io/<블로그>/로 만들겠습니다.
title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기

content: 3. Repository 생성1 github.com 로그인 우상단에서 + → New repository Repository name은 <블로그>로, 공개 설정은 Public으로, Add a license는 MIT로 하고 Create repository 가운데 초록 Code 위에 Settings 밑으로 내려가 GitHub Pages에서 source를 master branch로 변경 우상단에서 + → New repository Repository name은 <블로그 소스>로, 공개 설정은 원하는 대로, license는 MIT로 하고 Create repository 3번의 repository name을 다르게 하면 블로그 주소가 아래와 같습니다. repository name 블로그 주소 <블로그> https://<깃헙 아이디>.github.io/<블로그>/ <깃헙 아이디>.github.io https://<깃헙 아이디>.github.io/ 3번의 공개 설정은 Public으로 해야 GitHub Pages를 사용할 수 있습니다. License는 테마와 같게 해야하는 것 같은데 정확하지 않습니다. Repository에 포함되는 파일은 아래와 같습니다. repository 포함 파일 <블로그> 블로그 구성 파일 <블로그 소스> 블로그 구성 파일 + 나머지 블로그 구성 파일은 인터넷 페이지 파일인 .html 그리고 디자인 파일인 .css 등입니다. 나머지는 글을 작성하게 되는 .md 파일 등 사이트를 구성하는데 필요한 파일들입니다.
title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기

content: 4. Hugo 설정2 git clone https://github.com/<깃헙 아이디>/<블로그 소스>.git Terminal에서 위 명령어를 입력하여 <블로그 소스>라는 폴더를 만들면서 해당 repository를 복사합니다. hugo new site <블로그 소스> --force Hugo로 <블로그 소스>라는 폴더에 새로운 사이트를 생성합니다. 이미 폴더가 존재하기 때문에 --force 옵션을 사용하였습니다. cd <블로그 소스> <블로그 소스> 폴더로 이동 git submodule add https://github.com/dillonzq/LoveIt.git themes/LoveIt LoveIt이라는 테마를 clone이 아닌 submodule로 가져옵니다. 다른 테마를 원할 경우 themes.gohugo.io에서 찾으시면 됩니다. themes 뒤의 이름으로 폴더를 생성하는데 repository 이름과 같게 하였습니다. git submodule add -b master https://github.com/<깃헙 아이디>/<블로그>.git public public 폴더에 <블로그> repository를 submodule로 가져옵니다. touch deploy.sh deploy.sh 파일 생성 chmod +x deploy.sh 실행 가능하게 변경 아래 내용을 deploy.sh에 작성하고 저장합니다. #!/bin/sh cd public shopt -s extglob # turn on extended globbing rm -rf !(LICENSE) # remove all files and folders except LICENSE and .git file cd .. # If a command fails then the deploy stops set -e printf "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m\n" # Build the project. hugo # if using a theme, replace with `hugo -t <YOURTHEME>` # Go To Public folder cd public # Add changes to git. git add . # Commit changes. msg="rebuilding site $(date)" if [ -n "$*" ]; then msg="$*" fi git commit -m "$msg" # Push source and build repos. push to <블로그> repository git push origin master cd .. git add . git commit -m "$msg" git push origin master # push to <블로그 소스> repository 상기 배치 파일의 내용은 Host on GitHub1의 내용을 수정한 것입니다. 3번에서 6번 줄을 추가하여 public 폴더로 이동, extended globbing을 켜고 public 폴더 내에서 LICENSE와 .git 파일을 제외한 모든 파일과 폴더를 삭제하고3 상위 폴더로 이동합니다. Hugo의 경우 .md 파일로 글을 작성하고 해당 파일의 내용을 인터넷 페이지 파일로 생성합니다. 그런데 이 .md 파일을 삭제하여도 hugo는 생성된 인터넷 페이지 파일을 삭제하지 않습니다. 그래서 public 폴더 내에서 hugo 명령어로 생기지 않는 LICENSE와 .git 파일을 제외한 모든 파일과 폴더를 삭제하고 14번 줄에서 남아 있는 .md 파일에 대한 페이지를 다시 생성합니다. public 폴더로 이동 후 <블로그> repository에 commit과 push를 합니다. 32번 줄부터도 추가한 부분으로 상위 폴더로 이동하여 <블로그 소스> repository에 commit과 push를 합니다. ./deploy.sh "<메시지>" 위 명령어로 배치 파일을 실행하면 <메시지>로 commit을 합니다. 깃헙 아이디와 비밀번호를 요구 시 입력하면 됩니다.
title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기

content: 5. References https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ ↩︎ https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ ↩︎ https://unix.stackexchange.com/a/7274 ↩︎
title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기
